screenshots.caption: Most of the controls players utilize

name: Dr. Scenario
short_description: Dr. Scenario teaches health to youth through a series of scenarios.  The player tries to identify health conditions and juggles treatment costs with efficacy.  Explanations are provided in teen-friendly language to promote healthy living.
